context: Task to add content to README is extremely vague. 'X' is undefined - could refer to a feature, section, documentation, dependency, or any content. Cannot locate relevant files or understand implementation scope without clarification.
blockers: Undefined scope: 'X' could mean almost anything (feature description, API docs, installation guide, contributing section, changelog entry, etc.)
No context provided about what should be added or why
Cannot verify existing README structure without repository access
No clear success criteria or target audience for the README update

questions.question: What specific content should be added to the README?
options: A new feature/functionality description with usage examples
Installation or setup instructions for a new tool/dependency
An API reference or technical documentation section
A section in an existing category (e.g., contributing guidelines, changelog)

questions.question: Where in the README should this content be placed?
options: Create a new top-level section with its own heading
Add to an existing section (specify which: Overview, Getting Started, Features, etc.)
Insert as a subsection under an existing category

questions.question: What is the format and detail level expected?
options: Brief 1-2 line entry with a link to external documentation
Full section with description, code examples, and usage instructions
Quick reference table or checklist format
